text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: On my day off, I pay a visit to the<n>school library.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Let's see... "The Five-Star Italian<n>Compendium" and "The
Ultimate<n>Chinese Culinary Challenge"? Hmm,<n>these aren't
really what I had in<n>mind...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh! "Energizing Meals Made Easy"?<n>That sounds in the
right ballpark. Yeah,<n>I think I'll check out this one today—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, Teach?! Why're you here?<n>Didja come to stock up
on stuff to<n>read like me?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Noticing a book in Hishi Amazon's<n>hands, I ask her what
it's about.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, this? It's a cookbook. You can<n>only grow your repertoire
so much on<n>your own, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes I check out stuff like this<n>to really step up my
culinary game.<n>'Cause I don't just read the<n>recipes—I
actually make 'em.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So c'mon, Teach! We're gonna go<n>load up on the
ingredients listed in this<n>book!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Kay, grab a shopping cart, and I'll<n>start tossin' stuff in! First
up is<n>pumpkin, then fish sauce... Huh, I've<n>never used
these before.
choice_data_list: You must know a lot about cooking.
You must know a lot about cooking.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You bet! I do it every day! Then I give<n>my power-packed
provisions to the<n>youngsters. Feels good to see 'em<n>scarf
them down.
choice_data_list: So it's a hobby of yours?
So it's a hobby of yours?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
A hobby? Well, I guess you could call<n>it that. But it's not
really about the<n>cooking itself...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Actually, Teach, you seem really into<n>this. Does that mean
you cook too?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I can hold my own.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh?! So what you're saying is...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You've been acting all casual, but<n>you're actually my rival!
This whole<n>time, you were just playing dumb!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Dammit! Then that means I just<n>showed my whole hand to
the<n>competition! Argh!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Well, whatever. I'll lay all my cards<n>down on the table and
still score a<n>crushing victory! That's how ol'<n>Hishiama
gets stuff done!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it obvious? The two of us are<n>both whizzes in the
kitchen. So<n>there's only one thing to do! Have a<n>
one-on-one!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
As fellow travelers down the path of<n>cuisine, we won't be
satisfied 'til we<n>prove who's best, right?
choice_data_list: Not sure that applies to me...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Aww, c'mon, have some guts.<n>Finding out that you cook too
really lit<n>a fire under me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It's good for us Umas and our<n>trainers to square off on the
same<n>field once in a while, don'tcha think?<n>So let's have
a cook-off!

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
We have the entire cafeteria to<n>ourselves, so that means
it's cook-off<n>time!

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
In one corner, we have our dorm<n>leader—the iron maiden of
the kitchen,<n>Hishiama! All of us can vouch for her<n>cooking
skills.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Just so you know, I won't be holding<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
And in the other corner, we have<n>Hishiama's trainer. If you
want to win,<n>you'll have to serve up something<n>that
seriously tickles my taste buds!<n>Ooh, I can't wait! ♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hey, don't hijack our match just to<n>stuff yourself!

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, let my stomach get the better<n>of me for a minute
there...

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, let's get back to it. In this<n>battle of teacher and
student, it's eat<n>or be eaten! Let the cook-off... begin!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Aw yeeeah! It's on, Teach! Take that,<n>and that! Gotta get
that pot simmering!<n>Bubble, bubble, bubble!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what's the problem? That's just<n>the way I get into it.
Doesn't it help<n>heat things up?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You'd better get rolling too. Let's seewhat you can really do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Following a fiery cooking session, we<n>set our dishes side
by side on the<n>table.

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Now then, it's time to taste the<n>submissions. Here we have
the<n>trainer's dish—cheese and carrot<n>gratin topped with
honey.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whaaat?! You totally sold yoursoul, Teach! Look at you stuffing yourdish with popular ingredients just topander to the judge!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Curse you, junk food cook! Tch,<n>whatever. Go on and taste
it already.

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am. Munch, munch...Mmm, yum! It's melting in my mouth!♪

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ngh... I'd better try a bite too... No,<n>scratch that! My pride
won't allow it.

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Next up is Hishiama's entry—lightly<n>simmered pumpkin
and... mincemeat?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's right! It's a brand-new recipe I<n>found in a book. I
know it looks plain,<n>but just try it.

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am. Munch, munch......This flavor!

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
It's super plain! Not only does it look<n>plain, it tastes plain
too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you don't have to say it like<n>that! Argh... Guess it
doesn't have<n>much impact compared to Teach's<n>junk
food.

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh... But wait a minute. The flavor...

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
It's plain, but there's something else<n>there... Feels like I'm
being warmed<n>up from the inside...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh, looks like you finally noticed!<n>That's my secret weapon.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You should try it too, Teach. I'm sure<n>it'll strike a chord with
you. Trust me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taking a spoonful of the stew, I feel<n>the delicate flavor
spreading through<n>my body.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On top of being delicious, her cooking<n>is thoughtfully
prepared to cater to<n>those who will eat it. But when I<n>
attempt to give my compliments to the<n>chef...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Kn-knock it off! Did you forget I'm<n>your rival? I dunno how
I'm supposed<n>to respond to that.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But yeah, that's what I was gettin' atearlier. You were right—my hobbyis cooking. But that's not thewhole story.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: My real hobby is cooking uphealthy foods that'll give peopleenergy and motivation. That goes foryou too, Teach!

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Tweeeeet! The judges have reached<n>their decision. The
winner of this<n>captivating culinary contest is none<n>other
than...

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Actually, they were both delicious, so<n>it's a tie!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh?! What the heck?! Youmade it sound like I was a shoo-in forfirst place!

text_block_list.name: Referee Umamusume
text_block_list.text: But that melted cheese was just<n>sooo good!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Grr, falling for such an obvious trick...<n>Go drown yourself in
boba tea or<n>something!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, what do we do now, Teach?<n>Our big one-on-one
ended in a draw!<n>How're we supposed to solve this?
choice_data_list: We'll have to have a rematch sometime!
We'll have to have a rematch sometime!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
A rematch? Oh, yeah! That's right!<n>Even if it ended in a tie
this time<n>around, we can just do it again. We'll<n>have
plenty of chances from here on<n>out.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Haha. You're going down next time,<n>Teach! You and I are
partners, but<n>when it comes to the kitchen, we're<n>rivals
through and through!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Delighted to have found a worthy<n>adversary in her hobby,
Amazon<n>continues to pursue gentle flavors in<n>her
cooking—in stark contrast to her<n>personality.
